ya2.2.3:1.1: » Yassa rūpakkhandho uppajjati tassa vedanākkhandho nirujjhatīti? No.
ya2.2.3:2.1: « Yassa vā pana vedanākkhandho nirujjhati tassa rūpakkhandho uppajjatīti? No.
ya2.2.3:3.1: » Yassa vedanākkhandho uppajjati tassa saññākkhandho nirujjhatīti? No.

ya2.2.3:5.1: » Yattha rūpakkhandho uppajjati tattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhatīti?
ya2.2.3:6.1: Asaññasatte tattha rūpakkhandho uppajjati, no ca tattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhati. Pañcavokāre tattha rūpakkhandho ca uppajjati vedanākkhandho ca nirujjhati.
ya2.2.3:7.1: « Yattha vā pana vedanākkhandho nirujjhati tattha rūpakkhandho uppajjatīti?
ya2.2.3:8.1: Arūpe tattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhati, no ca tattha rūpakkhandho uppajjati. Pañcavokāre tattha vedanākkhandho ca nirujjhati rūpakkhandho ca uppajjati.
ya2.2.3:9.1: » Yattha vedanākkhandho uppajjati tattha saññākkhandho nirujjhatīti? Āmantā.

ya2.2.3:15.1: » Yassa rūpakkhandho nuppajjati tassa vedanākkhandho na nirujjhatīti?
ya2.2.3:16.1: Catuvokārā pañcavokārā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ rūpakkhandho nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ vedanākkhandho na nirujjhati. Arūpaṃ upapajjantānaṃ asaññasattā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ rūpakkhandho ca nuppajjati vedanākkhandho ca na nirujjhati.
ya2.2.3:17.1: « Yassa vā pana vedanākkhandho na nirujjhati tassa rūpakkhandho nuppajjatīti?
ya2.2.3:18.1: Pañcavokāraṃ upapajjantānaṃ asaññasattaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ vedanākkhandho na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ rūpakkhandho nuppajjati. Arūpaṃ upapajjantānaṃ asaññasattā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ vedanākkhandho ca na nirujjhati rūpakkhandho ca nuppajjati.
ya2.2.3:19.1: » Yassa vedanākkhandho nuppajjati tassa saññākkhandho na nirujjhatīti?
ya2.2.3:20.1: Catuvokārā pañcavokārā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ vedanākkhandho nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ saññākkhandho na nirujjhati. Asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ vedanākkhandho ca nuppajjati saññākkhandho ca na nirujjhati.
ya2.2.3:21.1: « Yassa vā pana saññākkhandho na nirujjhati tassa vedanākkhandho nuppajjatīti?
ya2.2.3:22.1: Catuvokāraṃ pañcavokāraṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ saññākkhandho na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ vedanākkhandho nuppajjati. Asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ saññākkhandho ca na nirujjhati vedanākkhandho ca nuppajjati.
ya2.2.3:23.1: » Yattha rūpakkhandho nuppajjati tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhatīti? Nirujjhati.
ya2.2.3:24.1: « Yattha vā pana vedanākkhandho na nirujjhati tattha rūpakkhandho nuppajjatīti? Uppajjati.

ya2.2.3:119.1: « Yassa vā pana vedanākkhandho nirujjhissati tassa rūpakkhandho uppajjitthāti? Āmantā.
ya2.2.3:120.1: » Yassa vedanākkhandho uppajjittha tassa saññākkhandho nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.3:121.1: Parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ vedanākkhandho uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ saññākkhandho nirujjhissati. Itaresaṃ tesaṃ vedanākkhandho ca uppajjittha saññākkhandho ca nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.3:122.1: « Yassa vā pana saññākkhandho nirujjhissati tassa vedanākkhandho uppajjitthāti? Āmantā.
ya2.2.3:124.1: » Yassa yattha rūpakkhandho uppajjittha tassa tattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.3:125.1: Pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpakkhandho uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhissati. Itaresaṃ pañcavokārānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpakkhandho ca uppajjittha vedanākkhandho ca nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.3:126.1: « Yassa vā pana yattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhissati tassa tattha rūpakkhandho uppajjitthāti?
ya2.2.3:127.1: Suddhāvāsaṃ upapajjantānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha rūpakkhandho uppajjittha. Itaresaṃ pañcavokārānaṃ tesaṃ tattha vedanākkhandho ca nirujjhissati rūpakkhandho ca uppajjittha.
ya2.2.3:128.1: » Yassa yattha vedanākkhandho uppajjittha tassa tattha saññākkhandho nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.3:129.1: Parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha vedanākkhandho uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha saññākkhandho nirujjhissati. Itaresaṃ catuvokārānaṃ pañcavokārānaṃ tesaṃ tattha vedanākkhandho ca uppajjittha saññākkhandho ca nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.3:130.1: « Yassa vā pana yattha saññākkhandho nirujjhissati tassa tattha vedanākkhandho uppajjitthāti?
ya2.2.3:131.1: Suddhāvāsaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha saññākkhandho nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha vedanākkhandho uppajjittha. Itaresaṃ catuvokārānaṃ pañcavokārānaṃ tesaṃ tattha saññākkhandho ca nirujjhissati vedanākkhandho ca uppajjittha.
ya2.2.3:132.1: » Yassa rūpakkhandho nuppajjittha tassa vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissatīti? Natthi.
ya2.2.3:133.1: « Yassa vā pana vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissati tassa rūpakkhandho nuppajjitthāti? Uppajjittha.
ya2.2.3:134.1: » Yassa vedanākkhandho nuppajjittha tassa saññākkhandho na nirujjhissatīti? Natthi.
ya2.2.3:135.1: « Yassa vā pana saññākkhandho na nirujjhissati tassa vedanākkhandho nuppajjitthāti? Uppajjittha.
ya2.2.3:137.1: » Yassa yattha rūpakkhandho nuppajjittha tassa tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.3:138.1: Suddhāvāsaṃ upapajjantānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpakkhandho nuppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissati. Suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṃ arūpe parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpakkhandho ca nuppajjittha vedanākkhandho ca na nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.3:139.1: « Yassa vā pana yattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissati tassa tattha rūpakkhandho nuppajjitthāti?
ya2.2.3:140.1: Pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha rūpakkhandho nuppajjittha. Suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṃ arūpe parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha vedanākkhandho ca na nirujjhissati rūpakkhandho ca nuppajjittha.
ya2.2.3:141.1: » Yassa yattha vedanākkhandho nuppajjittha tassa tattha saññākkhandho na nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.3:142.1: Suddhāvāsaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha vedanākkhandho nuppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha saññākkhandho na nirujjhissati. Suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha vedanākkhandho ca nuppajjittha saññākkhandho ca na nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.3:143.1: « Yassa vā pana yattha saññākkhandho na nirujjhissati tassa tattha vedanākkhandho nuppajjitthāti?
ya2.2.3:144.1: Parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha saññākkhandho na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha vedanākkhandho nuppajjittha. Suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha saññākkhandho ca na nirujjhissati vedanākkhandho ca nuppajjittha.
